creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: slightly concave underside; steeply outward-flaring sides; rounded small shoulder, flaring inward, with wide mouth; white ground with dark brown and rust red geometric decorations; band around shoulder with rust colored bars and triangular forms with curved sides, with two bands of brown triangles beneath; body decorated with repeated elements with zigzags and two white arcing forms in UR
title: Pot
